sentences.sContent: He conceals his feelings behind a rather stolid manner.
sentences.sContent_eng: He conceals his feelings behind a rather stolid manner.
sentences.sCn: 他装作无动于衷的样子以掩盖自己的感情。

synos.tran: 迟钝的；缺乏热情的；冷漠的

trans.tranOther: someone who is stolid does not react to situations or seem excited by them when most people would react – used to show disapproval
